items.title: A group of American investors led by Hollywood producer Robert Simonds has agreed to acquire NSO Group in a deal valued at "several tens of millions of dollars" (Omer Kabir/CTech)

A group of American investors led by Hollywood producer Robert Simonds has agreed to acquire NSO Group in a deal valued at “several tens of millions of dollars”  —  Hollywood producer Robert Simonds leads the deal, subject to Israeli and U.S. regulatory review.

items.title: Major Russian strikes cut power in Kyiv and across Ukraine

items.title: Melania Trump says some children caught in Ukraine war returned to families after talks with Putin
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -U.S. first lady Melania Trump said she had secured an open line of communication with Russian President Vladimir Putin about repatriating children caught up in the Ukrainian war, and that some have been returned to their families with more to be reunited soon. items.title: Use GOOLOO’s GP4000 24,000mAh starter to jump car batteries or as a power bank for an $85 low (Reg. $140+)
items.summary:
If you head over to the official GOOLOO Amazon storefront, you can pick up the popular GP4000 Jump Starter at $84.98 shipped. Usually going for a full rate of $170, though recently we’ve seen it keeping down at $140, this year has seen discounts ping-ponging the price between $90 and the $85 low constantly, which is what we saw during the Prime Day event earlier in the week and is continuing here today. You can pick one up for your peace of mind with $55 slashed from the going rate ($85 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked. The brand also has multiple other models available to browse in its official storefront here.

items.title: Chainalysis: crypto balances tied to illicit activity exceed $75B, with ~$15B held by illicit entities and $60B+ in wallets with downstream exposure to them (Sam Bourgi/Cointelegraph)
items.summary:
Sam Bourgi / Cointelegraph:
Chainalysis: crypto balances tied to illicit activity exceed $75B, with ~$15B held by illicit entities and $60B+ in wallets with downstream exposure to them  —  Chainalysis says $75 billion in crypto tied to illicit activity could be recoverable — a figure that may influence nations weighing official crypto reserves.

items.summary: LONDON (Reuters) -An Afghan national was on Friday found guilty of making a threat in a TikTok video to kill Nigel Farage, the leader of the populist Reform UK party which leads opinion polls in Britain. Read full story

items.title: Man wins appeal over conviction for burning Koran outside London's Turkish consulate
items.summary: LONDON (Reuters) -A man found guilty of committing a religiously aggravated public order offence by setting fire to a copy of the Koran outside London's Turkish consulate had his conviction overturned on Friday in what supporters said was a victory for free speech. Read full story

items.summary:
We’re still seeing a lot of ongoing Govee Prime Day discounts at Amazon giving folks more time to pick up indoor and outdoor smart ambient lighting devices at some of the best prices of the year. One such model that is ripe for grabbing ahead of the Christmas season is Govee’s Christmas Cone Tree Lights down at $119.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page coupon. Normally $160 at full price, these lights first dropped down to this rate at the start of Prime Big Deal Days on Tuesday, with the savings continuing here for an unknown amount of time longer. You’ll be upgrading your holiday display with $40 cut from the tag, giving you the best new price that we have tracked to date.

items.title: This wireless power bank with USB-C cable is one of the few 20K MagSafe 25W Qi2 models out there, now down at $80 low
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find UGREEN’s official storefront offering its new 20,000mAh Qi2 25W MagFlow power bank down at $79.99 shipped. This is a brand-new model that hit the scene a few weeks back carrying a $120 price tag, and it’s now seeing a nice launch deal down at $40 off. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this battery pack, that is among the few 20,000mAh MagSafe power bank there, and it even supports 25W Qi2 wireless charging. This model, as you can tell, is definitely a bit on the bulkier side, but UGREEN also offers a 10,000mAh version for anyone who doesn’t want a heavy power bank attached to their phone or taking up space in their EDC. Head below for more details, along with slimmer alternatives.

items.title: EcoFlow 48-hour flash sale drops 800W alternator charger to new $289 low ($210+ off), more from $104
items.summary:
As part of its extended Prime Day Sale, EcoFlow is offering a 48-hour flash sale on a power station, a generator, an alternator charger, and a DELTA Pro Ultra expansion battery bundle. The backup power solution amongst the bunch is the TRAIL 200 DC station, which you can score starting from $104 by checking out yesterday’s coverage. From there, it’s a matter of what kind of support or expansion you want to jump on, with the brand’s 800W Alternator Charger sitting at a lower-than-ever $289 shipped, for example, which also matches at Amazon right now. While it carries a $599 MSRP, we more often see it priced between $348 and $499, with some sales taking things lower. It was priced at $305 for the initial Prime Day savings, but is now falling even further to mark a new all-time low price and give you $210 off the going rate. Head below for the full lineup of flash deals.

items.title: Regularly $1,600 LG UltraGear 39-inch 240Hz WQHD OLED curved gaming monitor is nearly 50% off at $850 all-time low
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops LG’s UltraGear 39-inch 240Hz WQHD OLED curved gaming monitor down to $849.99 shipped. This is regularly a $1,600 display, which is now seeing a straight-up 47% discount for Prime members. Today’s deal shaves a whopping $750 off its usual going rate, landing it $26 below its fall Prime Day low from earlier this week. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this monitor to date, and it’s a good option to consider if you’re in the market for a new OLED display for your battlestation. You’ll also find the 34-inch variant of this model down at $688.94 shipped with a solid 51% discount on its usual going rate. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Ministry of Finance: No extension for excise duty exemptions on imported EVs
items.summary: Tax exemptions on imported fully-assembled (CBU) electric vehicles will not be extended further. This is based on the information provided by the Ministry of Finance (MOF) through the newly published Fiscal Outlook and Federal Government Revenue Estimates 2026. According to the report, indirect tax for 2026 is projected to grow by 8.9% to RM83 billion. […]

items.title: Sonos Ace wireless over-ear ANC headphones back at $299 Amazon low ($100 off)
items.summary:
Amazon is still offering its Prime Day price on the Sonos Ace wireless over-ear ANC headphones. These can launched with a $450 list price, similar to that of the super popular Sony XM6, but starting sometime this past summer the asking price dropped to $399 and now you can score a set on Amazon for $298.99 shipped.

items.title: Woot PC gaming sale now live at up to 67% off: SSDs, GPUs, monitors, from just $20
items.summary:
Woot has kicked off a new PC Builder’s Corner sale, as part of which it’s offering a bunch of PC and gaming gear at up to 67% off. We’re looking at both PC components and peripherals like SSDs, graphics cards, and monitors discounted as part of the sale, and the prices for these start at just $19.99 Prime shipped. All these items are in brand-new condition, so snag them while you can if you’re planning to upgrade your battlestation before the holidays. Head below for more details.

items.title: A new simulation from the European Central Bank shows that the digital euro could trigger a deposit outflow of up to €700B during a run on commercial banks (Reuters)
items.summary:
Reuters:
